services.offering: Port my Python module to Python 3 (<5000 LOC)
services.description: Having trouble moving code to Python 3 or simply don't have the experience? Call on @tonybaloney to migrate your code to support Python 3.5 and above. @tonybaloney developed the 'Migrating from Python 2 to 3' course at Pluralsight, leading developers all over the world to port their code to the newest version of Python.
